summary: Daggers benefits from the fortify one handed enchantment. Works with custom daggers.
descriptionHtml:
Description
This mod allows ALL daggers to benefit from the fortify one handed enchantment. It works with custom daggers from other mods.

Why have I created this mod?
There are other mods that try to do the same considering daggers like swords or daggers/swords. But to do that it's necessary to change each kind of dagger properties individually. So if you have a custom dagger of another mod, it won't work.
Instead of that, I have only modified the behavior of the fortify one handed enchantment, so it will work with all daggers, for example, Tantos of Weapons of the Third Era.

Incompatible Mods
Fortify one handed for daggers was fixed in the Unofficial Skyrim Patch v1.2.1 - (2012-09-12), so don't use both or the effect will be applied twice.

Note
When using SkyUI and equipping an item with the fortify one handed enchantment, if the damage value in the weapon list is not updated, refresh it by closing/opening the inventory or unequipping/equipping the weapon.

My other mods
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33502]Upgraded Weapons and Armors for Enemies[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28964]Clothing for mages[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31746]Pierce resistances[/url]

I'm not a native English speaker, so forgive/correct/understand me if I make a mistake ;)
author: josec87
